languages.text: "Я не терплю на корабле бездельников, и офицеры это знают".

traits.locale_text: "Я не терплю на корабле бездельников, и офицеры это знают".

languages.text: "I do not tolerate idlers on this ship, and my officers know it well."
languages.original_text: "Я не терплю на корабле бездельников, и офицеры это знают".

traits.locale_text: "I do not tolerate idlers on this ship, and my officers know it well."
"I do not tolerate idlers on this ship, and my officers know it well."
"I do not tolerate idlers on this ship, and my officers know it well."
"I do not tolerate idlers on this ship, and my officers know it well."
"I do not tolerate idlers on this ship, and my officers know it well."

languages.text: "Ich dulde auf diesem Schiff keine Müßiggänger, wie meine Offiziere nur zu gut wissen."
languages.original_text: "I do not tolerate idlers on this ship, and my officers know it well."

traits.locale_text: "Ich dulde auf diesem Schiff keine Müßiggänger, wie meine Offiziere nur zu gut wissen."

languages.text: « Je ne tolère pas les tire-au-flanc sur ce vaisseau, mes officiers le savent parfaitement. »
languages.original_text: "I do not tolerate idlers on this ship, and my officers know it well."

traits.locale_text: « Je ne tolère pas les tire-au-flanc sur ce vaisseau, mes officiers le savent parfaitement. »

languages.text: “我的飞船不养闲人，想必他们都很清楚这一点。”
languages.original_text: "I do not tolerate idlers on this ship, and my officers know it well."

traits.locale_text: “我的飞船不养闲人，想必他们都很清楚这一点。”

languages.text: 「私はこの船上で怠け者を許容していないし、士官たちもそれを十分に承知している」
languages.original_text: "I do not tolerate idlers on this ship, and my officers know it well."

traits.locale_text: 「私はこの船上で怠け者を許容していないし、士官たちもそれを十分に承知している」

languages.text: «No tolero holgazanes en esta nave y mis oficiales lo saben bien».
languages.original_text: "I do not tolerate idlers on this ship, and my officers know it well."

traits.locale_text: «No tolero holgazanes en esta nave y mis oficiales lo saben bien».

languages.text: "Bu gemide boş oturana ekmek yok. Subaylarım da bunu iyi biliyor."
languages.original_text: "I do not tolerate idlers on this ship, and my officers know it well."
